typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_name as string,
		Currency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_alloc_percentage as string,
		Asset_country as string,
		Asset_Region as string,
		Asset_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_master,
		Fund_master_name,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master = Fund_master,
		Fund_master_Name = Fund_master_name,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country = Fund_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingDB
